<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Teaching Assistant](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2068)</title>

<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 57</row>

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +11, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +11, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +12, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +9, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +13, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +11, [Twilight Castrum Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
[moderate cognitive mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=87), [Padded Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 55

**Immunities**
olfactory effects

**Resistances**
[negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) 7

**Sacrifice Minion** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The teaching assistant is adjacent to a [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109) ally when they're targeted by an attack or an effect that requires a Reflex saving throw; **Effect** The triggering effect is redirected to target the minion ally.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing plus 2d6 negative

**Occult Prepared Spells** DC 22, attack +14
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286)
- **1st**
[Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
- **2nd**
[Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63), [False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Spirit Link](/Spells.aspx?ID=302)
- **3rd**
[Animate Dead](/Spells.aspx?ID=666), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)

**Necromantic Revitalization** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The teaching assistant disperses negative energy in a 30-foot emanation. Living creatures in the area take 3d8 negative damage (DC 22 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save); willing undead creatures in the area regain an equal amount of Hit Points.

</column>
